reviewText: Good for watching technique and dedication for surfing and long distance racing

This a a great collection of a few talented people who are pushing the sport of Sup. I feel that parts of the movie are a little cheesy, but I'd have to say it has incredible shots of Sup surfing that I have only seen on SUP magazine covers. You get to see the videos the stills were taken from. I also feel this movie will document the beginnings of the sport and the passion these people have for the sport. Destined to be a classic sup surfing film.
Excellent movie it is one of my top five movies b Great trip great paddlers great places It is always entertained.
I saw a premier of this film, meeting the filmmaker and Josh Groban. The film was so fun and engaging for all ages, I had to buy it and share it with friends.

Awesome Stand Up Paddle film.  Beautiful images, exciting surfing, funny, charming and great to watch.

Very exciting Stand Up Paddle surfing .  Watch and learn from the greatest athletes in the sport.  And they are all so handsome and so charming.  You feel like you are right with them on the boat in Indonesia.  You are one of the buddies.  They are funny and interesting to watch.  You see the ultimate in Stand Up Paddling.
